text.en: May all disharmony, obstacles and hindrances be thoroughly pacified;
text.en-trans: mitün barché gek kün yongsu zhi

text.en: May our wealth and prosperity and supplies of all that we desire expand and multiply;
text.en-trans: dögu püntsok paljor pel zhing gyé

text.en: May we gain the power of spontaneously accomplishing whatever we wish;
text.en-trans: gang sam yizhin lhündrub wang gi chuk

text.en: And may we overcome foes and obstructers and reign victorious over all!
text.en-trans: dragek tsarchö chok lé namgyal shok
